about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a unique psychological horror experience. In **SnaPaul**, explore a disturbing and mysterious house where every corner could hide unexpected horrors. This first-person game will make you experience rising tension and an atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat throughout the game.

A nightmare that lasts only 30 minutes... but will stay with you far longer.

If you're looking for a brief yet intense experience, **SnaPaul** offers a storyline that will challenge you to overcome your own fear. There are no escapes: uncover the secrets of a house that harbors a dark and threatening past. But be warned... what seems safe may only be an illusion.

Key Features:

* **First-Person Gameplay**: Experience fear firsthand as you explore dark, detailed environments.

* **Psychological Tension**: Every sound, every shadow, every movement could mark the beginning of a new nightmare.

* **Claustrophobic Atmosphere**: The house you're trapped in is alive and threatening, and each step brings you closer to the truth... or madness.

* **4 Unique Achievements**: Face your fears and prove your courage by unlocking all achievements. Each one marks a different encounter with terror.

Are you ready to discover what lurks in the darkness? Your mind and courage will be tested in **SnaPaul**. Can you face your fears and unlock all achievements? Brace your nerves, because once you enter... you'll never be the same.

content_descriptors.notes:
"CONTENT WARNING:
This game contains explicit violent scenes that may disturb some players, including:

Scenes of graphic violence
Depictions of mutilation
Themes and scenes involving suicide

The game is intended for a mature audience. Not recommended for minors or individuals sensitive to these themes."

name: SnaPaul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 a 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 o AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti o equivalente
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 a 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 o AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti o superiore
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space

short_description: SnaPaul is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore a dark, mysterious house. With 30 minutes of intense gameplay and 4 unique achievements to unlock, every step brings you closer to a chilling finale. Face your fears and uncover hidden secrets in this unforgettable experience.
